text: Fifth Harmony is touring Latin America this week singing their smash hits like ` ` Down,'' ` ` Work From Home'' and ` ` Worth It,'' just to name a few. For this leg of their tour, Becky G is the opening act for the girls. At their stop in Argentina's Luna Park, the group that was formed on Season 2 of ` ` The X - Factor USA'' was singing ` ` Flex,'' when someone rushed on to the stage and security swiftly reacted and removed her. But the problem is that the girl they removed was actually our girl Becky. Video of the moment has now gone viral on social media and it shows Becky running to the girls and security getting a hold of her and pulling her away.
